contentList.content:
Gond is the god of inventiveness, crafting, and smithing, known as the Lord of All Smiths, and pushes for his worshippers to be imaginative and innovate at almost any cost. He is mostly worshipped by gnomes who know him also as Nebelun.

Domains: Forge, Knowledge
Alignment: Neutral

Gond is the god of inventiveness, crafting, and smithing, known as the Lord of All Smiths, and pushes for his worshippers to be imaginative and innovate at almost any cost. He is mostly worshipped by gnomes who know him also as Nebelun.

Gond is the god of inventiveness, crafting, and smithing, known as the Lord of All Smiths, and pushes for his worshippers to be imaginative and innovate at almost any cost. His paladins wear highly intricate suits of armor and wield technologically advanced weapons crafted by their own hands as marks of their faithfulness.
